name: devArt fix new header
description:
Fixes a few ugly features of the header of the October 15th update, 2014.
- Removes trending hashtags from browse pages
- Moves profile options on header to the left
- Makes submit button less bright
additional_info:
Oct 18 edit: old version accidentally hid Mature Content button, fixed.
Oct 29 edit: old version accidentally hid some text after searching, fixed.

Fully commented, few lines, public domain.
Does not work on Internet Explorer.
